name: Trident SoftLab
description:
Our company is responsible for the full cycle of creation, development, and management of remote Agile Software Development Teams.
The key difference from Offshore Agile Software Development Team is that newly formed team will fully meet the requirements of your project and will share your corporate values. Setting Up and Maintaining of your Offshore Agile Software Development Teams will be carried out by widely renowned experts of Trident SoftLab.

Trident SoftLab has 5 years of experience in setting up successful remote and parallel software development teams. We have a team of consultants that focus on making the work between software development teams in Ukraine and our customers’ organizations better. We have vast experience in processes analysis and improvements within software development companies.
Our team always aims to deliver to our clients the best services by implementing the high-quality solutions which are precisely adapted to their needs. We offer cost effective Software Development Teams establishment, support and management services that allow our customers to concentrate on their core business processes and to be one step ahead of their competitors. We use the following practices: Classical management, PMI, Scrum, Kanban, Agile, Lean, RUP, Prince2, SAFe, LESS, Nexus and other best practices as well as Agile Scaling. The combined experience of our consultants is over 50 years in Software consulting in largest international companies.
Unlike in the traditional project outsourcing model, we help clients to establish their own software development centers in one of our offshore software development locations in Ukraine where they outsource, completely or partially, their software development processes. This is the equivalent of having your in-house IT specialists, but for a significantly lower cost and with less administrative nuisances.
